modName: vanilla style nude texture for CBBE
summary: a CBBE reskin looks very (pseudo-) vanilla, v3 compatible and dependent, color friendly with the vanilla face.
descriptionHtml:
vanilla style nude texture for CBBE, v3 dependent and fully compatible with \"bodyslide\". *

key features:
dirty. :)
pseudo-vanilla.

required, female body replacer (and bodyslide):
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3[/url]

recommended, female face normals: **
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1039]HD Normals v1 - Females[/url] by EvilDeadAsh34

installation: ***
1. install required (and recommended) mods properly.
2. to fix the neck seam for normals, you will have to use \"texblend\" manually, get full version here. ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5737]Caliente\'s Texture Blender[/url])
3. then, overwrite the following files.

\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\
femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalebody_1_s.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehands_1_s.dds

* and the armour/clothes conversions. ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12273]Caliente\'s Vanilla Armor for CBBE[/url])

** for normals: you may also use the resource from official high resolution texture pack, extracting all face normals in \"HighResTexturePack01.bsa\" (\\textures\\actors\\character\\*) by using some .bsa unpackers.

*** workaround for the texture overrides by high-res texture pack, and related fix:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8236]HD Textures DLC Fix[/url] by Hionimi and krist2

changelog 0.2:
pubic hair, optional
small changes on Caliente\'s normals (mons pubis contours)
better seams (legs and torso)

credit:
Caliente for the body, textures, meshes, applications
Bethesda Softworks

thank you.
